bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Henry Schuman, February 20, 1946

div1.p: Hench thanks Schuman for sending the “North Carolina Medical Journal” article on yellow fever.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Henry Schuman, February 20, 1946
div1.opener:
February 20, 1946
Mr. Henry Schuman
20 East 70th Street
New York, 21, N. Y.
My dear Mr. Schuman:
div1.p:
Thank you very much indeed for sending
me the North Carolina Medical Journal for January with
the interesting article on yellow fever. I don't think
I would have caught that and I am very glad to have it.

I hope that you will be able to get me
one of those Public Health Proceedings of which I wrote
you previously.
div1.closer: Sincerely, P. S. Hench, M. D. psh:ds
